website_summaries.verdict: The wool in this mop is a natural fiber and cleans the floors easily.
pros: Picks up dirt with a swish and a shake
Works great on hardwood as well as tile
Comes with a telescoping handle and a swivel handle
Better than a broom at picking up some small debris
Works better on laminate surfaces than microfiber
cons: This mop is not machine washable

customer_reviews.title: wooly mop just like Moms.
customer_reviews.text: wooly mop just like Moms..except Mom's didn't fly off the handle while shaking out the window...and had to be dug out of the snow. Great on the floors except the handle adjustment keeps coming loose and readjusting itself mid sweep. mop head is now screwed on and the handle is "duct taped". Too bad such a good product is a ruin due to the handle...Should have gone with the wooden handle and skipped "prime"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry-Mop Option Available
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes nothing beats the old-fashioned options, and this traditional wool mop is a good example. Mine stands in corner ready for quick grab to pick up dog hair and dirt quickly; it beats all the microfiber versions by a landslide. Easy to shake out. Can wash and air dry. Extendable handle is great addition. My mom was thrilled when she replaced her carpeting with flooring and I gave her one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer NAS

customer_reviews.title: It is a lot like my old Stanley mop I had years ago seems ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot like my old Stanley mop I had years ago seems like it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Corbin

customer_reviews.title: broke on 3 use, aprox. 1 month old, and shows it is not eligiable for return
customer_reviews.text: love the mop. just like my grams. I had read some negative reviews, about the handle breaking. I kind of ignore those reviews, because I figure either it is a rare occurance, and probably will not happen to me, or the product was not properly taken care of. Well, mine broke on the 3rd use. The instructions said to shake clean, so I went outside and shook it and the mop end flew away. Purchased about 1 month ago, used 4 times. if you are willing to take a chance, it is a great mop, mine is broken, and no good
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Joeckel

customer_reviews.title: Leaves wool threads behind
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this mop for my many wood floors to pick up the dust. Unfortuneately it leaves behind wool hairs in the seams of the wood. Granted my floors are not absolutely perfect, the seems have tiny slits between here and there. And the wool hairs find them all, and leave behing a trail. It seems like a decently weel made mop with a nice adjustable handle. My daughter loved the look and the fact thats it wool. But sadly, it doesn’t work for my floors :(
customer_reviews.author: TJW

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS MOP
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product 100 I would. I have shopped all over for a "dust mop" and all that are in the stores today are "swifters". They are not mops. All they do it push the dust around. NOT THIS MOP! I spray a little Endust on the bottom and go to town. Everything stays with the mop. Then I go and shake the dust off outside and do the rest of the house. I LOVE THIS MOP!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Belanger

customer_reviews.title: No longer drowning in dog hair dust bunnies.
customer_reviews.text: I always though dust mops were a waste or a gimmick. Then I ordered this as a last ditch effort to keep up with the shedding of my English Bulldog and St. Bernard. I just run this quickly over my floors as soon as I wake up and again just before going to bed. Takes just a few short minutes each time for the whole main floor. It makes a HUGE difference. Still have to sweep and mop a couple times per week because of messy grandkids but it’s so much cleaner than before. You should see all the dog hair fly when I shake it out in the yard. LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love this dust mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop definitely collects all the dust and dirt on the floor. However, it doesn't really stick to the mop. I push it into a pile and then use a dustbuster to suck up the piles as I go. It is so much faster than a regular broom (which also kind of stirs up some dust into the air). This does not stir up any dust at all; it collects it all. I love that all I have to do is shake it out outside when I'm done. Replaces a broom and any swiffer dry mops I've used before. Wish I'd gotten it a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: EricaJo

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found this years ago! We have three big dogs and three boys in a big house with lots of hardwood flooring. Our floors are always dirty. I am loving having this sweet little dust mop for quick swipes throughout the day! SO much easier than pulling out the vacuum and WAY better than using a broom. It’s cute and light and super easy to use. It really does grab all the dog hair! I am so impressed. I only wish I’d bought the bigger size but I may talk myself into it and keep this one for upstairs. I also really appreciate the sustainability, washability, and that they’re made in the US!
customer_reviews.author: EHN,RN

customer_reviews.title: Love this dust mop!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...love this! It has cut my work in half. It is awesome to use on my dusty wood floors, so I no longer have to bend down using a vacuum or other cleaning device. It easily reaches under furniture and beds and then I shake it outside or even use the hose on the vacuum to fluff the strings and remove the collected dust. What a labor saver this is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gloryb50

customer_reviews.title: Greatest dust mop ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently had laminate floors put in my entire house. This Big Wooly Dust Mop does a fantastic job. I try to hit the high spots every other day and then once a week I do a deep clean, getting under beds, chairs, tables and anything else the Big Wooly will go under, which is almost every thing in my house. I can do my whole house so quick, I wonder why I had not done this years ago. When finished, just open your back door and give Big Wooly a shake and it is ready for another day. I highly recommend this great dustmop.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new home two years ago and this will be the third dust mop I have purchased. Others were the same price but poorly designed and manufactured and either didn't work effectively or just broke. I have very happy with this one. It is simple. I like the natural wool fibers and the telescoping handle. The removable wool mop head is sturdy and attached with a lot of velcro. It will not come off unless you choose to take it off. It seems to pick up a lot more dust than my previous synthetic fiber mops. I think this one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Clark

customer_reviews.title: Poor handle design
customer_reviews.text: Received today, straight from the box, the tip to hang the mop is unattached. The telescoping handle will not secure so it is impossible to use. I love the wool top but in this condition it cannot be used.
customer_reviews.author: K B.

customer_reviews.title: Forget The Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Recently had new hardwood flooring put in and, with two dogs, dragging the vacuum out daily is a hassle. This little old-time beauty is exactly what I wanted for repeated daily use. Perfectly sized to get into corners and under low furniture with absolutely no hassle. Attracts dust and dog hair like a magnet.
customer_reviews.author: LEA

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the wool fibers. I don’t like the residue that some, like swiffer, leave behind. This was exactly what i wanted. The pole is light weight and easily extends. The hole on the end is able to turn for easy flat hanging. I have only shaken it out at this point after use so not sure how a more through cleaning will affect the strings. Im thinking that hand washing, like suggested, is the way to go. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M and L

customer_reviews.title: Does not pick up dust and pet hair
customer_reviews.text: They way the product is describe, the dust and pet hair are supposed to cling to the dry mop because of the natural lanolin. That has not been our experience. It does push the dirt around where I can get it into a pile--just like a broom, but I still have to use a dust pan to pick it all up. My mop is dry-- no lanolin to cling to. One good thing, it will go under furniture and drag the dust and pet hair out...but, other than that... Not a successful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dmowhite

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Top This Mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. It picks up so much dirt, dog hairs and dust bunnies that invade the house daily. You will probably learn to love it more than chocolate. The wool makes is dense, thus it keeps its shape. If you decide to wash it in the machine, you will spend a considerable amount of time pulling the strands apart.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Krull

customer_reviews.title: Great Wool Mop
customer_reviews.text: Great mop, not sure what the negative reviews related to its size are about because its slightly larger than Grammy's old time mop. It's likely called big wooly because its fluffy but if you want to see that fluff right away the instructions tell you to mist it with water and allow to air dry. Of course it's compressed new because of exactly that. Made in Vermont is also a nice Americana feature!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Mop will not stay together falls apart every time I used it - it is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than flat dusters for the floors
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an 'old fashioned' dust mop and decided to try this one. It is perfect! Dusts the wood and tile floors in our house just perfectly. It catches the cobwebs in the floor spaces under the cabinets and in no time at all my floors are dust free! Shakes clean as can be too.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Almost my mother’s old rag mop.
customer_reviews.text: I still have my mother’s woolen rag mop. She would be 106. It needed cleaning and I moved from a house with places to do that into a condo. I don’t want stray yarn in the drain. I haven’t thrown it out yet. This new one has thinner yarn but fits into smaller places. The extension handle will be good for my high ceilings and beams. Maybe it will last 60! Years or more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: I just love this mop. It looks like it is just a lot of pieces of yarn sewed together.... but it works so good. It's nice and big and it easily swirls around just like I remember using as a child many years ago. It's pricy but it sure is a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: 281bella

customer_reviews.title: good dust catcher
customer_reviews.text: this is like the dry mop my mother had when I was a child. I have been looking for this type of mop because I know it was great for catching dust and dog hair. I have 2 large dogs that shed heavily at times and I like it. you do have to take it outside to shake it to remove the dust and hair but it is good for getting into and under spaces because the mop head has no hard formed shape .
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great job and saves money too!
customer_reviews.text: It really does a great job. A great job is what I like, and this does it better than Swiffer! Therefore... The price is right. I would be spending A FORTUNE for a lifetime of disposable items to do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Smith

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, easy to use with the telescoping handle. It keeps all the dust bunnys at bay from under the bed. Easy to clean with just a few shakes(outside of course). Amazing how much dust it will hold. My wife says it is the BEST she has ever used....I will take her word for it.
customer_reviews.author: madtownrydr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DUSTMOP
customer_reviews.text: This dust mop is great--you don't need Endust or other product to dust--just shake off the dust--more expensive than the Quickie Dust Mop but it's better built and NOT plastic like the Quickie which all the working parts of it was plastic and did not last 6 months. With the Quickie, I ordered 2 replacement 'mop' parts then the 'handle' part broke--useless! You'll be satisfied with this mop!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Wool mop picks up dust better than anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Wool is indeed the ideal material for a dust mop! Mop size is ideal. The mop head swivels nicely and it is easy to reach underneath furniture. All my floors are hardwood and this mop allows me to dust the whole house in record time. Shakes out to clean. Very pleased with this (made in USA) product!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful old-fashioned dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this dust mop! It's a throw-back and vastly superior to the other threadbare dust mops I see in stores today (especially the microfiber junk). It performs beautifully in picking up dust and with its natural oil finish I do not use any cleaning substance on it. Expensive, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for collecting dust bunnies.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Just arrived yesterday (earlier than promised) I’ve used it under the beds and dressers. I’ve captured Many dust bunnies. We have new hardwood floors, 6 months. The floor tool on the central vac just wasn’t getting the dust under the furniture. The floor looks clean and dust free after running the mop head underneath! It shakes out easily. It really does hold the dust until you shake it out.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: It cleans well, I thought the mop was adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this dust mop. There’s only one complaint I have. I’m 5’2” and I feel yhe mop could have been better if it had a handle that was at least 4” longer.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I bought this plus 2 replacement heads
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this plus 2 replacement heads. My floors are dark hickory and the dust magically appears quickly. With this it magically disappears just as quickly. Its nice to make my floors look great without dragging out the vacuum. Also it's nice to have something that cleans without electricity. And the floors stay cleaner longer than with disposable cloths!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dust mop
customer_reviews.text: The mop is sturdy and it makes quick cleaning much easier. I use it on hardwood and tile. Other mops fell apart and the mop would not stay on the stick. Many years ago I had a wonderful Stanley dust mop, so, on a whim, I checked to see if I could find one on Amazon. I am delighted to have this dust mop!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Aman

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this wooly dust mop! Even after 2 years!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The Big Wooly has been hard at work for over 2 years in our farmhouse floors...still does the job...hand wash in cool water every now and then....LOVE that it is Made in the USA...fine quality product Sladust! Finally! A dust mop that actually picks up the dust bunnies and cocker spaniel curls in the corners of the room. The mop is easy to use, conforms to corners, over chair legs and into tight areas. Vacuuming just does not take care of tumbleweeds in those hard to reach areas. Love, Love, Love this wooly dust mop!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Works better than any other dust mop I’ve ever owned.....
customer_reviews.text: The mop does better than a vacuum for picking golden retriever hair off hardwood and tile floors. Great for that matter. I liked it so well I bought the matching duster as well. I know it’s a bit more in cost than other mops but so well worth the difference for something that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: etngranmom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I found this. A REAL dust mop! What a godsend. Whoever decided that Swifter mops could take the place of dust mops, has just never used a good dust mop. It’s sturdy and I am so relieved to find this. You cannot find a dust mop in a store any longer. I know. I tried for a couple of years. Thank you for making this dust mop.
customer_reviews.author: guillermina alvarez

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This mop cleans hardwood floors quickly and easily, quickly picks up dust and pet hairs. Easy to clean with a few shakes every thing comes off and its ready to use again. I have 2 cats and 2 dogs so really like how quickly it picks up pet hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Marks

customer_reviews.title: Love this Dust Mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this dust mop. We recently had Laminated floors installed and this works really well to pick up dust, dog hair and dirt. It is wonderful on my new floors and is easy to use since I have back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Just like mom's!
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors & 2 big German Shepherds & an Australian Shepherd which means lots of dog hairs! This so far is wonderful for picking up dog hairs. I first ran it over walls & corners to get rid of cobwebs then used it on my floors. Shake it out & I have dog hairs outside the house not inside! So far wonderful product & highly recommend highly. Being wool I would not wet mop with it cause wool takes forever to dry but dry mop use it is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Melrose

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Swiffer
customer_reviews.text: While I did like using Swiffer for quick clean-ups, I found them to be costly using on a continual basis. This mop takes care of that and more. Quick and efficient and gets to places where the squared shape of Swiffer cannot. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwoods!
customer_reviews.text: I love this duster! The only thing is, it is tougher to clean than I thought it would be. I soaked it in water with a little mild soap as directed but it takes days to dry and there's no easy way to squeeze the water out. Other than that, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: time saver
customer_reviews.text: i received this dust mop two days ago, i have used it everyday since. It is exactly what i remember my mother used when i was a kid, it takes far less time to dust all three bedroom in about 15min. what i have now i hate to use because it take too long and i have to continue to change the terry cloth cover after one use. I heard that to clean rinse with woolike and air dry, i'm fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this dust mop so much I named it Wooly Mammoth. Just bought a huge house with laminate floors. Sweeping and swiffering didn’t work for me. This mop is super easy and crazy fast. Floors are done in a heartbeat. Company sent on time packaged securely and with a lovely hand written note! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn McCullah

customer_reviews.title: The one and only broom you need for every day sweeping!
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search for the perfect broom for my entire adult life (16 years), and have gone through many different styles. I am a stay at home, home schooling mom to 4 small children, and I sweep a lot. This broom is AMAZING! It sweeps really well, grabs everything, and then shakes out nicely too. I am very happy with it, and love that it’s a natural material that will last a very long time! Happy floor sweeping addict here!
customer_reviews.author: jackiez

customer_reviews.title: Best dust mop ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best dust mop ever! It picks up every bit of dust and glides under all our cabinets and other furniture with ease. I’d buy it again, however I doubt it will ever wear out. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley C. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The metal is not what I expected. Very flimsy. Like a cheap dollar store broom handle. It telescopes fine and glides easily. The mop head is scratchy and tough, not soft as I assumed. It does collect dog hair but no more than a cotton dust mop does. I doubt there is any lanolin in it as advertised. The wool is too dry for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mothergirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 91 yr old mother is REALLY hard to please and we replaced her old wool mop with this one. She loves it! She likes the shape and size and of course wool is the best picker upper for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: kat c

customer_reviews.title: Old school dust mop,thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: I like the mop, it is easy to use, gentle hard wood thanks to the natural lanolin. It a bit of a challenge to shake out ,but I am not judging...it may be that I have to "adjust"to shaking it . I would recommend this mop though. Just toss that Swifter crap out and back up to the tools that granny proved worked best.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Call

customer_reviews.title: Picks up all the dust and dirt
customer_reviews.text: Works great after a few uses to loosen up the wool fibers so they flow freely and pick up all the dust and dirt on the floor. Easy to use and shake out. Liked it well enough I showed it to a friend and have just bought one for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this dust mop! Why am I just figuring out how amazing pure wool dustmops clean up dust like magic! I can even remove pet hair from my sofas with this little gem. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette H.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it works great at gathering up our long haired cats fur, just take it outside an shake it off, or you can even use a brush on it to clean it. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use & Assemble
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for our hardwood floors through out our home* easy to use, picks up everything in its path just a Gtreat Producr And From USA Vermont quick shipping* Wow Fast. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: (Duke)

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? I rent an apartment in an old farmhouse. The floors are wide plank wood, probably 100 years old. With my long-haired cat, I constantly have little fur dust bunnies swirling around the floor and its a pain to drag out the vacuum. All I did with this mop was swoop, swoop around the living room, dining room and bedroom, took it outside and was AMAZED at all the fluff and dust that I shook out of it! Wonderful item, would recommend to anyone with floors.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: wow -will never be without this product
customer_reviews.text: received today - and am amazed at the ease and the amazing job donewithso little effort. better than a lifetime of cotton dust mops - this is the BOMB- my wood floors used to waft with pet hairs right after the cleaning lady left - now I can be proud of clean shiny foors with a simple swizzle around the floor with this amazing product. I was considering doublingthe cleaner time - now that won'ytne necessary (and yes I am a somewhat lazy housekeeper- until now). Buy it and relax.
customer_reviews.author: che in Ca

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made in a while!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this big woolly duster❤️ So easy to use. Light weight, very maneuverable, I was able to get under everything. Best purchase I’ve made for a while!
customer_reviews.author: marianne cannon

customer_reviews.title: That this product is excellent and works perfectly throughout the house.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this Big Wooly. I have tile floors everywhere and this works perfectly. Love it. Big Wooly is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: My Idea

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a 100 stars I would! This dust mop gets everything! Every piece of cat hair. All the tiny dirt in the grooves. It's a beast. But it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy K

customer_reviews.title: Great on hardwood floors and tile!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dust, it easily goes under all my furniture and it's a good size to maneuver around and under furniture/objects. The more you use it, the fluffier it gets. I've had it over a month, and so far, it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Wool dust mop head.
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle, sturdy enough. Definitely not flimsy. Anticipate years of use. Dust mops are nice for touch ups on LVP or hardwood floors. Mop head is a very nice size.
customer_reviews.author: BLBA

customer_reviews.title: Dusts wooden flooring great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wooden flooring. It picks up all the dust. After use I take it out back and shake it out ready for the next use. Cuts cleaning time 80 percent. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wears

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mop worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Best dustmop ever! Large head picks up dust and pet hair fast. It is also very easy to shake out. We appreciate the telescoping handle for different size moppers. Best of all, this excellent product is made in the United States. This high quality mop is wotrh the price since this mop should last many years!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Treader

customer_reviews.title: That is picks up dust.
customer_reviews.text: Dust Bunnies tremble in it's path. This is a really good dust mop. No chemicals needed, lots of surface area, the wool/lanolin does it's job. It's also nicely designed so it slips under the lowest of furniture. Easy to shake out, haven't even needed to wash it though I've had it a few months. Adjustable handle is sturdy ,too. Worth the money - good company,
customer_reviews.author: WMD/B&O Guy

customer_reviews.title: Does not pick up dust ...just moves it from one place to another...
customer_reviews.text: this does not pick up the dust it moves it from one place to another then you have to shake it outside to remove the dust....disappointed.....sorry....
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie K.

customer_reviews.title: Save Money Over Time With This
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: FIVE YEARS since I bought this. Still love it. Zero problems, no breaking and still picks up cat hair better than anything else. My go-to cleaner for a house full of wood floors. I have two cats, and this is the best I have found. Beats a swiffer simply because you can do many more square feet before having to shake it out (or change the swiffer pad). And cheaper in the long run for sure. Get this thing! :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: It was ok at picking up light dust, but anything bigger than very light dust just stuck in it and had to be pulled out by hand, it bunched up into a ball and was hard to rub around on the floor...Just didn't work at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Keith

customer_reviews.title: Wool Dust Mop From Stanley Home Products!
customer_reviews.text: They always made terrific mops and brooms, BUT This one is Just the Coolest thing!! Just love the telescoping handle!! Keep up the good work to whoever makes them now!!
customer_reviews.author: josey

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Dad worked at Stanley Home Products for 42 years. We always had their products, so I'm happy to have a comparable dry mop to use. Its very nice. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to get this seeing there are so many good reviews. Either this company is paying people to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I got a knock off brand, or what happened but this does not pick up anything from my dark hardwood floors. It works as a broom pushing things into a pile, but does not pick up anything. The handle extends but won't stay long and keeps collapsing making it hard to push across the floor. I was excited to get this seeing there are so many good reviews. Either this company is paying people to write them or I got a knock off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G Hoy

customer_reviews.title: best dustmop ever!
customer_reviews.text: After years of housecleaning and numerous types and brands of dusters, this is the absolute best I have ever used! Easy to push around, nice big swivel head, and so easy to shake out to remove dust! I would recommend this product to everyone who has hardwood floors. It will make your cleaning experience so easy and it does a superior job to all others. Joyce from Charleston, SC
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Rockett

customer_reviews.title: Pet hair gone- fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is that it isn't reversible. My Belgian malinois sheds alot. I use this daily to clean up pet hair and dirt. It does not pickup the dirt just sweeps it in a pile, finish cleaning with dust pan. Take dust mop outside and shake til hair is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: In this case, old school is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: My new daily buddy. I can’t believe how easy it is to keep my new hardwood floors beautiful. Nothing works better than wool. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: T Jerger

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite cleaning item!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just like the one my mother swore by over 50 years ago! I didn’t know these were still made and was so excited to find/receive it. I now am the one swearing by it... once again, I’ve become my mother!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have laminate floors and wool area rugs. These rugs produce a lint and we are constantly sweeping. The mop works great because it has a wider scope of coverage, and it picks up all the 'lint' -even under chair legs, etc. My mom had one of these years ago, and she had it forever, so I hope this one is of the same ilk. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood flooring
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mop. It makes cleaning hardwood floors a breeze without chemicals and disposable pads. Easy to get around and under furniture. Quality product and made in the USA. My grandparents and my parents both had similar mops (perhaps from the same company) and they are still in use. The only thing I didn't care for was the metal handle. I would have preferred a sturdier wooden handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. I have two dogs and am constantly sweeping up the mess they bring in. This mop gets it up in one pass. My cleaning lady thinks it is great too.
customer_reviews.author: RNPR

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this mop almost every day. We have four dogs who shed. It is time to clean it. Hope it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you just can't beat the classics
customer_reviews.text: This mop is amazing on my hardwood floors. I have had it over a year and use daily. Quality and construction of the handle is terrific, and the will used in the mop head is on point. An amazing upgrade to the mop I saw my grandmother use daily as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jean Queen

customer_reviews.title: Love this dust mop!
customer_reviews.text: We had real solid wood floors installed in our house in all areas where we once had carpet, leaving only the kitchem, baths, laundry room and entrance foyer in porcelain tile. This dust mop reminds me of the one my mother used growing up. It does a great job of cleaning up dust and cat hair and then I shake it outside. It only takes about 5 minutes a few times a week to keep my house ready for unexpected visitors. Should have removed that carpet years ago!
customer_reviews.author: sawandquilt

customer_reviews.title: 50 years can be wrong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it's similar to a dust mop my mom has used for probably 50 years. I have hardwood floors and it's amazing how much dust and dirt this little mop picks up! It's lightweight and, since mine is new, I haven't cleaned it yet but it seems to not need it yet. I'm in love with this handy little mop!
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Fair. ..
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up all. Dust but not small crumbs.. pushes it to one place and then have to sweep up
customer_reviews.author: heidi ridlon

customer_reviews.title: Handy helper
customer_reviews.text: We are friends already. It reaches under my couches and bed. It wipes clean with paper towel or a good shake in the basket. I don't think I will wash it ...just brush it. It's a very strong handle.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The long strands of yarn get into corners and around table and chair legs much better than the usual rectangular mops. I use this on my laminate flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Armnstrong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat these dust mops. Back in the fifties, Stanley products sold these. My mom always used wool dust mops. I have laminate floors and ceramic tile and this cleans them great.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Easy on your body
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors and two Lhashons. ....beautiful and furry. This wonderful dust mop cannot be beat! It is a great way to do a quick and easy clean up, very efficient! Thank you for this great tool, so well made and easy. Keep up the excellent work... and thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwood floors and 2 cats. Need I say more. I use it once a day to keep ahead.
customer_reviews.author: SamsPookie

customer_reviews.title: Defective handle
customer_reviews.text: Handle was in two parts. The top part was a totally different type of handle from the bottom part.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Blender

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is expensive, but it's the best product out there and worth getting. It sweeps the sand and dog hair perfectly. Its like using a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dust Mop
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome dust mop. Our hardwood floors are dark and show every speck. I use it daily and it keeps our floor clean with very little effort!!
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Grabs dust and holds until you carry it out side for a good shaking. Good size and easy to maneuver around table legs, and under dressers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this dust mop
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a mop like this for some time. I love it! It's great on our new hardwood floors. Haven't cleaned it yet so I can't say how it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for wood floors. Picks everything up and leaves a nice shine on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something little bigger so I returned it and ordered the Mammoth Wooly in replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice dust mop
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit nostalgic to me to have a dust mop - but it is a low tech thing that really works. (Had to explain to my boyfriend that you take it outside and shake it to get the dust out). Besides floors - it is good for getting cob webs off the corners of walls. Goes under and around things easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Lightweight, easy, fast.
customer_reviews.text: I Love this! Fast and easy. Tons of dog hair here. Fastest easiest way to control it all. Lightweight, simple, easy
customer_reviews.author: CO Mtn Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good but challenging to shake off
customer_reviews.text: Shaking the debris off of this is a bit of a pain. Everything sticks to it but I suppose that's a good thing. The swivel feature makes it hard to shake out as well because it just flips around.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Flexible head, strong light handle, and excellent dust attraction.
customer_reviews.text: Great dust mop. Strong light handle that stays extended. Extremely flexible mop head that goes everywhere. Shakes out readily. This will be my go-to mop for my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Motreywas

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This dust mop is very nice. I used it to clean walls and baseboards. Did a great job and is easy to use. The dust shakes out easily. I love this dust mop!
customer_reviews.author: andrea fletcher

customer_reviews.title: It works and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great at picking up dog hairs....and 'stuff' I track in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great dust pickup.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dust mop! Picks up and doesn't let go until you shake. Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Carol

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and the price is very reasonable...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great friendly to use dust mop.
customer_reviews.text: I love the telescoping handle for reaching up high. The mop head picks up the dust very well without just raising a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wakevainen

customer_reviews.title: The dust mop does a great job getting under furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it picks up dust very well and it doesn't leave anything behind.
customer_reviews.author: JDZdesigns

product_meta.title: Sladust Big Wooly with Metal Telescoping Handle
feature_bullets: All Wool Dry Mop with natural Lanolin - NO chemically laced, disposible pads required
The metal telescoping handle has a resin coating to prevent corrosion (NOT PLASTIC). It is strong but light weight and extends from 34" to 59"
Swivel head provides maneuverability for easy cleaning; a durable all wool head on a 12" frame - dusting area is 11" x 18"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,125 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
